title: Drawing, 1769
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, red ink
inscribed: At bottom: Pianta per il 'deseri' esguito in pietra dura l'Anno 1769/ per Sua E[ccellen]za il Sig[nor] Abbasciatore di Malta (PDM'91)
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, 1769.
1769. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, red ink. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-2418.
